name: Helmed Horror Detention Drone
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The drone has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Spell Immunity
entries: The drone is immune to three spells chosen by its creator. Typical immunities include {@spell fireball}, {@spell heat metal}, and {@spell lightning bolt}.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The drone makes two longsword attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4 damage) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4 damage) slashing damage if used with two hands.
